item.title: AWS Machine Learning Specialty: Know these math formulae before exam!
item.description: Formulae Cheat Sheet to Prepare for Machine Learning Specialty Basic Formulae for Classification Precision, Recall and Specificity $$ Precision = PPV = \frac{TP}{TP+FP} \\\\ Recall = Sensitivity = TPR = \frac{TP}{TP+FN} \\\\ Specificity = TNR = \frac{TN}{TN+FP} \\\\ $$ F1-Score $$ F1 = \underbrace{\frac{2 * TP}{TP + FP + FN}}_{\text{In terms of TP, FP and FN}} \\\\ $$ $$ F1 = \underbrace{\frac{2 * Precision * Recall}{Precision + Recall}}_{\text{In terms Precision and Recall}} \\\\ $$
